title: Lagged out (MS went to 500 flat) nearing end of a game. Re opened game, now I can queue?
body:
Hi,
So I got DC'd in a match almost at the end. My MS (only in game, everything else was running fine) spiked to 500. My game got stuck "Attempting to reconnect" so I closed it to try and reconnect. However, when I closed it the client wouldn't give me the option to reconnect, instead I could queue up for a new game. Problem being, the match is not in my match history and [OP.GG ](https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=l%20%20%C2%BA%20%20v%20%20%C2%BA%20%20l)says that I am currently in game. Please help, I just came off a leave buster punishment and I'd hate to get stuck in another one so soon :\

replies.body:
Spooky! It sounds sorta like you encountered a Ghost Game here. There was probably a server hiccup that caused the game to drop and not be recorded. In essence, it 'never happened', so you won't actually be affected by the drop and you won't receive Leaver Buster for it either. :)

If you keep getting more of these, feel free to hit up our Tech Team in a [**ticket **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and let them know. They'll see if there's something they can help with and also collect the data for those missing games to research.
